author: Starixx 💢
content:
💢 The red curves of the Pakistan Monument echo the journey of Tabi, discovering stories hidden in architecture, color, and quiet corners of Pakistan.

💢 Red isn’t just a color here, it’s a statement.

A reminder that even still places can speak loud.

#Tabizen #PakistanMonument

author: SANSA 💢
content:
Not printed. Not perfect.
🔥 Hand-torn. Rage-born.
Crafted from cotton, powered by emotion.
This isn’t just a logo — it’s a feeling. 
one that burns through fabric,
screams without sound,
and leaves a mark that never fades.
💢 This is Tabi.
